value:
$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Take this! And that! And how about
a bit of this as well?!$k$p$WmMPID_カトリーヌ,ch17_34_Shamir_FF_Pair,Face|Hey there. Can I ask what exactly
you're doing with that parasol?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Is it not obvious? I am training!$k$pShould fiends of some sort assail
this beach, I shall be prepared to
give them a sound thrashing!$k$p$WmMPID_カトリーヌ,ch17_34_Shamir_FF_Pair,Face|Hmm. Green hair, check. Sort of
a pretentious air?$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Check. I think we found her.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シェズ男,ch17_67_Sheds_M_Swim23,Face|Hah! This time I win!$k$p$WmMPID_水着シェズ女,ch17_68_Sheds_F_Swim23,Face|No way. You hit the beach first, but
we agreed that this boulder would be
the finish line.$k$pI got to it first, by a nose.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シェズ男,ch17_67_Sheds_M_Swim23,Face|Oh come on... Ugh, fine! One more
rematch. Hey, you! Come here a
minute. We need a judge.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|Sorry, but I can't help you. I'm busy
looking for someone, at the moment...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Hah! No beach-monster shall get the
better of L'Arachel! Yah!$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|So this is where you've been hiding.
I've been looking all over, you know.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Oh, Ephraim. You need not have
gone to the trouble. Please, go
enjoy your sibling quality time.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|Ah, I understand now. You're sulking.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|I beg your pardon?! How rude of you
to suggest such a thing! I am merely...
feeling introspective.$k$pSeeing you and your sister together,
I feel a desire for something I can
never have. It is rather...discomfiting.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|What do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|I lost my parents when I was young,
so I have had a long time to accept
that I will always be an only child.$k$pNevertheless, I admit that there were
times, back then, when I wished...$k$pI thought perhaps, if I'd had a sibling,
then I would have at least had a
companion in my loneliness.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|I understand. I would be lying if I said
that having Eirika by my side hasn't
saved me time and again.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Reluctant as I am to admit it... I envy
you for that.$k$pUgh, how unbecoming! I am a
princess! I should envy no one!$k$pAll the same, I cannot help how I feel.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|There's nothing wrong with those
feelings, but they are unnecessary.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|What makes you say that?$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|If you're feeling down, there are a lot
of people who would be willing to
help you unshoulder your burden.$k$pYou have your retainers, you have the
pontifex—and you certainly have
Eirika and me.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Ah...$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|It's true that the bond between
siblings is a special one.$k$pBut that doesn't mean you are alone,
or that you can't have any special
bonds of your own.$k$pMy sister and I are always willing to
lend you an ear. All you have to do is
speak up.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|That's right!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Eirika! How long have you been
standing there?!$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|I didn't want to interrupt, so I was
lurking behind this tree.$k$pL'Arachel, I'm so sorry if we ever
made you feel alone. But I promise
you that you're not.$k$pAnd for what it's worth, I would love
it if you thought of me as your sister.
I'd happily play that role for you.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Truly? Eirika, I...$k$pI will gladly accept that sentiment.
Thank you.$k$pYou know, Ephraim, I am beginning
to appreciate your point of view
on this matter.$k$pIn fact, I am suddenly feeling so
blessed that I dare say it would insult
the heavens for me to desire more.$k$pMy noble blood, my radiant visage,
my brilliance, my magical talent...
I have almost too much going for me!$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|Back to your old self, I see.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|That's the L'Arachel we know
and love!$k$pNow, what do you say we all head
down to the water?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Ah... To have such lovely friends
might be the greatest blessing of all...$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|L'Arachel? Did you say something?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Nothing at all, my friend. Yes, let's go
for a swim!$k$p$Sbs150|
